General.Name: Quectel Wireless Solutions Co Ltd
General.Description: Quectel Wireless Solutions Co., Ltd develops and sells communication modules worldwide. The company offers 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G, LPWA, automotive, smart, and Wi-Fi modules; standalone GNSS; and EVB kits. It serves asset tracking, automotive, commercial telematics, digital signage, fixed wireless access, payment, remote monitoring and control, smart metering and grid, and telehealth industries. Quectel Wireless Solutions Co., Ltd was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Science and Technology Oasis Phase 3, Shanghai, China, 200233
